name: No Longer Human
author: Osamu Dazai
descriptiom: It tells the story of a troubled man incapable of revealing his true self to others, and who, instead, maintains a fa√ßade of hollow jocularity, later turning to a life of alcoholism and drug abuse before his final disappearance. The original title translates as "Disqualified as a human being" or "A failed human".
